title: Gyro LP Alpha
desc: Gryoscope low pass filter alpha parameter

title: Acc LP Alpha
desc: Accelerometer low pass filter alpha parameter

title: Acc Threshold
desc: Accelerometer reading threshold, readings below this value are zeroed.

title: Inactive Time Threshold
desc: When accelerometer doesn't detect any acceleration within this time period we reset mouse state.

title: Server Address
desc: Server ip address and port after colon: ip:port
